designations.source: A review of the Hemiptera of Great Britain: The shieldbugs and allied families
designations.source_description: This report was commissioned to update the national status of shield bugs using IUCN methodology for assessing threat. It covers all species of Coreoidea, Pentatomoidea & Pyrrhocoroidea in Great Britain, identifying those that are rare and/or under threat as well as non threatened and non-native species.
designations.reporting_category: Nationally Scarce, Nationally Rare and Other Species
designations.designation: Nationally Scarce. Includes Red Listed taxa
designations.designation_description: Nationally Scarce - Occurring in 16-100 hectads in Great Britain. Includes rare species qualifying under the main IUCN criteria
designations.comments: Evidence of a contraction in range; modern records are mostly from southern England on the heaths of Surrey, Hampshire and Dorset
